title: IT Policy Common Questions
description: Quick reference for company IT policies and standard operating procedures.

steps.title: Software Requests
steps.instruction: All non-standard software must be approved by the Security Team before installation.

steps.title: Hardware Procurement
steps.instruction: Requests for new laptops or accessories must be raised through the internal ticketing portal with manager approval.

steps.title: Guest WiFi
steps.instruction: Guest access is for visitors only. Employees should always use the 'Enterprise' secure network.

steps.title: Data Security
steps.instruction: Never share passwords. Lock your machine (Win+L) whenever you leave your desk.

steps.title: Remote Work
steps.instruction: Always use the company VPN when accessing internal resources from home or public networks.
